questions.questionTitle: What are the speakers mainly discussing?
What does the man say about the woman's briefcase?
What does the woman say about the man's bike?

script:
� Jenna, new briefcase? It looks sharp. Matches your outfit.
� Thanks! I got it at a garage sale Saturday. It was only $3.
� Three dollars? Gee, you can't beat that. I bought a bike at a garage sale last year for $25. I ride it all the time.
� That's awesome. If I had time, I'd do all my shopping at garage sales.
